attributes.action: outlaw the practice of Gazumping, when buying or selling a property, or land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once a vendor has accepted an offer on a property (or land) and the buyers have financially committed themselves (for example paid for searches and/or other reasonble fees) I ask that, unless it is mutually agreed to discontinue with the purchase, it be made law that the seller must at least offer the buyer the opportunity to exchange within a certain time period of at least 1 week. If the vendor decides to pull out of the arrangement without offering a financially committed buyer the opportunity to exchange, the vendor automatically becomes liable for any reasonable costs incurred by the buyer.
